item.title: The ||kauru-opua, or little water-hole found in rock or stone
item.summary: The ||kauru-opua, or a small water-hole, is found in flat stones on the ground.
item.comments: 1) p.6091v: where these little water-holes occur, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: found in a flat stone or rock
of a little water–hole found in rock is ||kauru-opua
